title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message:
Hello again!,
Have 820-00840 with no image/backlight, no signs of liquid damage, boards look very clean. Tried different lcd, external, no image and no backlight on both. Tried to connect mouse for USB activity check, but there is no light coming on from mouse.
Board gets 20V and 0.6A
PLT_RST_L  3.3V
CPU_VCCST_PWRGD_R 0.99V
PM_SYSRST_L 3.3V
PM_PGOOD_CPUVCC 3.3V
PM_PCH_PWROK 3.3V
PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK  3.2V
PM_SYSRST_L 3.3V

title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message:
No reason to search for video, if no USB activity at least.

There should be some history fault.
Try known good BIOS.

title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message: I have found this link that you posted [URL]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LG3gKv3fU1177Qq-quX0FJbkpxxnFEwD/view[/URL] is this one good to try? Thank you.

title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message: Tried to reflash bios with the link above, still no usb activity/image. Any other ideas? :rolleyes:

title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message: Nothing specific, just stopped working one day without spilling liquid or dropping it.

title: 820-00840 no image/backlight
message: Then could be a CPU problem...
